definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
many and complicated/mired in minor details
Zoroaster, Zarathustra or Zarathushtra (c. 1200 BC), Persian prophet and founder of Zoroastrianism

pinyin: Suo3 luo2 ya4 si1 de2 jiao4

sentences.english: Bhavishya Purana explicitly identifies them with Zoroastrianism.
sentences.chinese: 未來往世書明確地把他們鑑別爲瑣羅亞斯德教徒。

sentences.english: Darius I, when in power, Zoroastrian as the state religion.
sentences.chinese: 大流士一世當政時，瑣羅亞斯德教定爲國教。

sentences.english: He claims that some Zoroastrian ideas influenced on Christian thinking.
sentences.chinese: 他聲稱一些瑣羅亞斯德教的思想影響着基督教。

sentences.english: The revelation of Zarathushtra from the beginning has been associated with light.
sentences.chinese: 瑣羅亞斯德的啓示從一開始就同火聯合在一起。
依照瑣羅亞斯德教學者Dr。

sentences.english: For Zoroaster was a monotheist, for whom Ahuramazda was the One god.
sentences.chinese: 因爲瑣羅亞斯德是一神論者，阿胡瑪茲達是唯一的神。

sentences.english: One of the controversies about Zarathushtra concerns whether he was a priest.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個有關瑣羅亞斯德的爭議就是他是否一位傺司。

sentences.english: These historians sometimes refer to this variation of Zoroastrianism as Zurvanism.
sentences.chinese: 這些歷史學家提到瑣羅亞斯德教的變體祖以萬教。

definition: to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to bother/to press sb, usu. to do sth/it's a tough job/sorry to bother you (polite, used to thank sb for a favor)
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
